1{-# LANGUAGE ScopedTypeVariables #-}
2{-# LANGUAGE PatternSynonyms #-}
3{-# OPTIONS_GHC -Wall #-}
4
5-- | Term-content calcutation.
6
7module Koshucode.Baala.Data.Church.Build
8  ( coxBuild, coxForm,
9  ) where
10
11import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Overture               as O
12import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Base                   as B
13import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Syntax                 as S
14import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Data.Class             as D
15import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Data.Content           as D
16import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Data.Church.Cop        as D
17import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Data.Church.Cox        as D
18import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Data.Church.Message    as Msg
19
20import Koshucode.Baala.Syntax.TTree.Pattern
21
22-- | Construct content expression from token tree
23coxBuild :: forall c. (D.CContent c)
24  => D.ContentCalc c -> D.CopSet c -> S.TTree -> B.Ab (D.Cox c)
25coxBuild calc copset =
26    convCox findCox            -- convert cox to cox
27      B.<=< Right
28      . debruijn               -- attach De Bruijn indicies
29      . coxUnfold              -- expand multiple-blank form
30      B.<=< construct calc     -- construct content expression from token tree
31      B.<=< prefix htab        -- convert infix operator to prefix
32      B.<=< convTree findTree  -- convert token tree to token tree
33    where
34      findCox  = D.copsetFindCox   copset
35      findTree = D.copsetFindTree  copset
36      htab     = D.copsetInfixList copset
37
38debruijn :: O.Map (D.Cox c)
39debruijn = index [] where
40    index :: [String] -> O.Map (D.Cox c)
41    index vars cox = case cox of
42       D.CoxBlank cp n     -> let v = B.name n
43                              in maybe cox (D.CoxLocal cp v) $ indexFrom 1 v vars
44       D.CoxFill _ _ _     -> D.coxCall cox (index vars)
45       D.CoxForm1 _ _ v _  -> D.coxCall cox (index $ v : vars)
46       _                   -> cox
47
48indexFrom :: (Eq c) => Int -> c -> [c] -> Maybe Int
49indexFrom origin key = loop origin where
50    loop _ [] = Nothing
51    loop i (x:xs) | x == key  = Just i
52                  | otherwise = loop (i + 1) xs
53
54coxUnfold :: O.Map (D.Cox c)
55coxUnfold = unfold . D.coxMap coxUnfold where
56    unfold :: O.Map (D.Cox c)
57    unfold cox = case cox of
58        D.CoxForm _ _ [] b -> unfold b
59        D.CoxForm cp tag (v : vs) b
60            -> let sub = unfold $ D.CoxForm cp tag vs b
61               in D.CoxForm1 cp tag v sub
62        _   -> cox
63
64convCox :: forall c. D.CopFind (D.CopCox c) -> B.AbMap (D.Cox c)
65convCox find = expand where
66    expand :: B.AbMap (D.Cox c)
67    expand (D.CoxForm1 cp tag n  x) = Right . D.CoxForm1 cp tag n  =<< expand x
68    expand (D.CoxForm  cp tag ns x) = Right . D.CoxForm  cp tag ns =<< expand x
69    expand (D.CoxFill  cp f@(D.CoxBlank _ n) xs)
70                                    = case find n of
71                                        Just g -> expand =<< g xs
72                                        _      -> fill cp f xs
73    expand (D.CoxFill  cp f xs)     = fill cp f xs
74    expand cox                      =  Right cox
75
76    fill cp f xs = do f'  <- expand f
77                      xs' <- mapM expand xs
78                      Right $ D.CoxFill cp f' xs'
79    
80-- construct content expression from token tree
81construct :: forall c. (D.CContent c) => D.ContentCalc c -> S.TTree -> B.Ab (D.Cox c)
82construct calc = expr where
83    expr tree = Msg.abCoxBuild tree $
84         let cp = concatMap B.codePtList $ B.takeFirst $ B.untree tree
85         in cons cp tree
86
87    cons :: [B.CodePt] -> S.TTree -> B.Ab (D.Cox c)
88    cons cp tree@(B S.BracketGroup subtrees)
89         = case subtrees of
90             f@(L (S.TText _ q w)) : xs
91                 | q == S.TextRaw && isName w -> fill cp f xs
92                 | otherwise -> lit cp tree
93
94             -- term with options (experimental)
95             (L (S.TTermPath _ ns)) : _
96                 -> Right $ D.CoxTerm cp ns []
97
98             -- fill args in the blanks (application)
99             f : xs -> fill cp f xs
100             []     -> lit cp tree
101
102    -- form with blanks (function)
103    cons cp (B S.BracketForm [vars, b1]) =
104        do b2 <- expr b1
105           let (tag, vars') = untag vars
106           let vs = map S.tokenContent $ B.untree vars'
107           Right $ D.CoxForm cp tag vs b2
108    cons _ (B S.BracketForm trees) =
109        B.bug $ "core/abstruction: " ++ show (length trees)
110
111    -- compound literal
112    cons cp tree@(B _ _) = lit cp tree
113
114    -- literal or variable
115    cons cp tree@(L tok) = case tok of
116        S.TTermN _ _ n             -> Right $ D.CoxTerm  cp [n] []
117        S.TTermPath _ ns           -> Right $ D.CoxTerm  cp ns []
118        S.TName _ op               -> Right $ D.CoxBlank cp op
119        S.TTextRaw _ n | isName n  -> Right $ D.CoxBlank cp $ S.BlankNormal n
120        S.TText _ _ _              -> lit cp tree
121        S.TTermQ _ _               -> lit cp tree
122        _                          -> B.bug "core/leaf"
123
124    cons _ _ = B.bug "core"
125
126    fill cp f xs =
127        do f'  <- expr f
128           xs' <- expr `mapM` xs
129           Right $ D.CoxFill cp f' xs'
130
131    lit cp tree  = fmap (D.CoxLit cp) $ D.contentCons (calc' tree) tree
132    calc' tree tree' | tree' == tree  = Msg.unkCox "Neither literal nor calculable"
133                     | otherwise      = calc tree'
134
135    untag :: S.TTree -> (D.CoxTag, S.TTree)
136    untag (B.TreeB l p (S.TextLeafQ _ tag : vars))
137                = (Just tag, B.TreeB l p $ vars)
138    untag vars  = (Nothing, vars)
139
140isName :: O.Test String
141isName (c:_)  = isNameFirst c
142isName _      = False
143
144isNameFirst :: O.Test Char
145isNameFirst c = case O.majorGeneralCategory c of
146                  O.UnicodeLetter  -> True
147                  O.UnicodeMark    -> True
148                  O.UnicodeSymbol  -> True
149                  _                -> False
150
151-- convert from infix operator to prefix
152prefix :: [B.Named B.InfixHeight] -> B.AbMap S.TTree
153prefix htab tree =
154    Msg.abCoxPrefix tree $
155     case B.infixToPrefix conv ht (B.TreeB S.BracketGroup Nothing) mapper tree of
156       Right tree3 -> Right $ undoubleGroup tree3
157       Left  xs    -> Msg.ambInfixes $ map detail xs
158    where
159      conv = (c D.copPrefix, c D.copInfix, c D.copPostfix)
160      c :: (String -> S.BlankName) -> O.Map S.Token
161      c f (S.TTextRaw cp s) = S.TName cp $ f s
162      c _ x = x
163
164      ht :: S.Token -> B.InfixHeight
165      ht = B.infixHeight wordText htab
166
167      wordText :: S.Token -> Maybe String
168      wordText (S.TTextRaw _ w) = Just w
169      wordText _               = Nothing
170
171      detail (Right n, tok) = detailText tok "right" n
172      detail (Left  n, tok) = detailText tok "left"  n
173
174      detailText tok dir n = S.tokenContent tok ++ " : " ++ dir ++ " " ++ show n
175
176mapper :: B.InfixMapper S.BracketType S.Token
177mapper f = loop where
178    loop (B.TreeB S.BracketGroup p xs) =
179        do xs' <- f xs
180           Right $ B.TreeB S.BracketGroup p xs'
181    loop (B.TreeB S.BracketForm p1 [vs, B.TreeB S.BracketGroup p2 body]) =
182        do body' <- f body
183           Right $ B.TreeB S.BracketForm p1 [vs, undoubleGroup $ B.TreeB S.BracketGroup p2 body']
184    loop tree = Right tree
185
186undoubleGroup :: O.Map (B.CodeTree S.BracketType a)
187undoubleGroup = B.undouble (== S.BracketGroup)
188
189-- expand tree-level syntax
190convTree :: D.CopFind D.CopTree -> B.AbMap S.TTree
191convTree find = expand where
192    expand tree@(B.TreeB S.BracketGroup p subtrees) =
193        case subtrees of
194          op@(S.TextLeafRaw _ name) : args
195              -> Msg.abCoxSyntax tree $
196                 case find $ S.BlankNormal name of
197                   Just f -> expand =<< f args
198                   _      -> do args2 <- mapM expand args
199                                Right $ B.TreeB S.BracketGroup p (op : args2)
200          _ -> do sub2 <- mapM expand subtrees
201                  Right $ B.TreeB S.BracketGroup p sub2
202
203    expand (B.TreeB S.BracketForm p trees) =
204        case S.divideTreesByBar trees of
205          [vars, b1] -> do b2 <- expand $ S.ttreeGroup b1
206                           Right $ B.TreeB S.BracketForm p [S.ttreeGroup vars, b2]
207          _ -> Msg.unkCox "abstruction"
208
209    expand tree = Right tree
210
211-- | Insert fresh form into indexed expression.
212coxForm :: [B.CodePt] -> D.CoxTag -> [String] -> O.Map (D.Cox c)
213coxForm cp0 tag vs = debruijn . outside [] . coxUnfold . D.CoxForm cp0 tag vs where
214    n = length vs
215    outside vars cox = case cox of
216       D.CoxLocal cp v i    
217           | v `elem` vars  -> D.CoxLocal cp v i        -- inside blank
218           | otherwise      -> D.CoxLocal cp v (i + n)  -- outside blank
219       D.CoxFill _ _ _      -> D.coxCall cox (outside vars)
220       D.CoxForm1 _ _ v _   -> D.coxCall cox (outside $ v : vars)
221       _                    -> cox
222
